system.description: You infuse your body with a reflection of celestial light. You are immune to disease and resistant to radiant damage. As an action you can gain a flying speed of 90 feet that lasts for 1 minute. For the duration your spells, eldritch blasts, and weapon attacks deal additional radiant damage equal to your spellasting ability modifier. Once you have used this ability you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.
